t: Amazon.in and Microsoft bring the Microsoft Brand Store experience to India - Microsoft Stories India
s: January 27, 2015 - New Delhi, 15th December, 2014: Amazon and Microsoft today announced the launch of the Microsoft Brand Store on the Amazon.in platform. The Microsoft Brand Store will enable consumers in India to enjoy the global Microsoft Store experience, while purchasing a range of Microsoft products.
